page.title: 07CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: There are quite a lot of clubs in Holcombe Rogus.Recently a Hand bell club has started at the church and 12 of us go to this on a Saturday morning.This is most interesting.A Youth Club meets at the Village Hall once a fortnight and most of us go to this.We have started a Cricket team recently.There is a Womens'Institute which meets at the Village Hall once a month,and a club called the Evergreens which is for retired people in the village.They have meetings and also trips during the summer months. A few of us go to Clubs in Wellington, where we go to gymnastics or swimming. One or two go to Hemyock for Scouts and Guides.
